com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.polygonmatch
Class WeightedMatcher

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.polygonmatch.WeightedMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureMatcher
public class WeightedMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements FeatureMatcher

Runs multiple FeatureMatchers, and combines their scores using a weighted average.

Constructor Summary
WeightedMatcher()
          Creates a WeightedMatcher with no matchers.
WeightedMatcher(java.lang.Object[] matchersAndWeights)
          Creates a WeightedMatcher with the given matchers and their weights.
 
Method Summary
 void add(FeatureMatcher matcher, double weight)
          Adds a matcher to the WeightedMatcher's matchers.
 Matches match(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature target, com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection candidates)
          Searches a collection of candidate features for those that match the given target feature, using each FeatureMatcher.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

WeightedMatcher

public WeightedMatcher()
Creates a WeightedMatcher with no matchers. Be sure to call #add.

WeightedMatcher

public WeightedMatcher(java.lang.Object[] matchersAndWeights)
Creates a WeightedMatcher with the given matchers and their weights.
Parameters:
matchersAndWeights - alternates between FeatureMatchers and Doubles
Method Detail

add

public void add(FeatureMatcher matcher,
                double weight)
Adds a matcher to the WeightedMatcher's matchers. If weight is 0, the matcher will be ignored.
Parameters:
matcher - a matcher to add
weight - the weight given to scores returned by the matcher

match

public Matches match(com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.Feature target,
                     com.vividsolutions.jump.feature.FeatureCollection candidates)
Searches a collection of candidate features for those that match the given target feature, using each FeatureMatcher.
Specified by:
match in interface FeatureMatcher
Parameters:
target - the feature to match
candidates - the features to search for matches
Returns:
the candidates that pass at least one FeatureMatcher. Each score is a weighted average of the scores from the FeatureMatchers.
